Description:
Detects when a user downloads a file from an IP based URL using CertOC.exe

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Download From IP Based URL Via CertOC.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\certoc.exe' and original_file_name = 'certoc.exe') and command re '://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' and command like '%-getcacaps%')
